description.english: Equip a tarot card.
description.german: Rüste eine Tarotkarte aus.
description.french: Équipez une carte de tarot.
description.italian: Equipaggia una carta dei tarocchi.
description.spanish: Equipa una carta del tarot.
description.schinese: 装备塔罗牌。
description.brazilian: Equipe uma carta de tarô.

description.english: During a raid, complete your first weapon mastery.
description.german: Vervollständige während eines Überfalls deine erste Waffenbeherrschung.
description.french: Lors d'un raid, complétez votre première maîtrise d'arme.
description.italian: Durante un'incursione, completa la tua prima maestria d'arma.
description.spanish: Durante una incursión, completa tu primer dominio de armas.
description.schinese: 在突袭中，完成你的第一次武器精通。
description.russian: Во время рейда завершите свое первое мастерство оружия.
description.polish: Ukończ swoją pierwszą biegłość w broni podczas rajdu.
description.brazilian: Durante uma incursão, complete sua primeira maestria em armas.

description.english: Destroy 3 corrupted eggs in 5 seconds to clear the corrupted water.
description.german: Zerstöre 3 verdorbene Eier in 5 Sekunden, um das verdorbene Wasser zu läutern.
description.french: Détruisez 3 oeufs corrompus en 5 seconds afin d’enlever l’eau corrompue.
description.italian: Distruggi 3 uova corrotte in 5 secondi per purificare l’acqua contaminata.
description.spanish: Destruye 3 huevos corrompidos en 5 segundos para purificar el agua maldita.
description.schinese: 在5秒内摧毁3个腐化的蛋来净化腐化水源。
description.russian: Уничтожьте 3 осквернённых яйца за 5 секунд, чтобы очистить осквернённую воду.
description.polish: Zniszcz 3 spaczone jaja w 5 sekund, aby oczyścić spaczoną wodę.
description.brazilian: Destrua 3 ovos corrompidos em 5 segundos para purificar a água maculada.

description.english: Use soul cage 40 times.
description.german: Nutze 40-mal einen Seelenkäfig.
description.french: Utilisez une cage d’âmes 40 fois.
description.italian: Usa una gabbia dell’anima 40 volte.
description.spanish: Usa una jaula de almas 40 veces.
description.schinese: 使用40次灵魂牢笼。
description.brazilian: Use a gaiola de almas 40 vezes.

description.english: Unlock any biome.
description.german: Schalte ein beliebiges Biom frei.
description.french: Déverrouillez un biome.
description.italian: Sblocca un bioma qualsiasi.
description.spanish: Desbloquea cualquier bioma.
description.schinese: 解锁任意炼狱之境。
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie qualquer bioma.

description.english: Complete 3 biomes on Nightmare difficulty.
description.german: Schließe 3 Biome auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad "Albtraum" ab.
description.french: Complétez 3 biomes à la difficulté Cauchemar.
description.italian: Completa 3 biomi a difficoltà Incubo.
description.spanish: Completa 3 biomas en dificultad Pesadilla.
description.schinese: 在噩梦难度下完成3个炼狱之境。
description.brazilian: Conclua 3 biomas na dificuldade Pesadelo.

description.english: Complete your first raid.
description.german: Schließe deinen ersten Raid ab.
description.french: Complétez votre premier raid.
description.italian: Completa la tua prima incursione.
description.spanish: Completa tu primera incursión.
description.schinese: 完成你的第一次突袭。
description.brazilian: Conclua sua primeira incursão.

description.english: Complete 3 different raids on Nightmare difficulty.
description.german: Schließe 3 verschiedene Raids auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad.
description.french: Complétez 3 raids différents à la difficulté Cauchemar.
description.italian: Completa 3 incursioni diverse a difficoltà Incubo.
description.spanish: Completa 3 incursiones diferentes en dificultad Pesadilla.
description.schinese: 在噩梦难度下完成3次不同的突袭。
description.russian: Завершите 3 разных рейда на уровне сложности «Кошмар».
description.polish: Ukończ 3 różne rajdy na poziomie trudności "Koszmar".
description.brazilian: Conclua 3 incursões diferentes na dificuldade Pesadelo.

description.english: Collect an extra life.
description.german: Sammle ein Extra-Leben auf.
description.french: Récupérez une vie supplémentaire.
description.italian: Raccogli una vita extra.
description.spanish: Recoge una vida extra.
description.schinese: 收集到一次复活机会。
description.brazilian: Obtenha uma vida extra.

description.english: Earn 66 ancient souls by completing raids.
description.german: Verdiene 66 uralte Seelen durch das Abschließen von Raids.
description.french: Gagnez 66 âmes anciennes en complétant des raids.
description.italian: Ottieni 66 anime antiche completando le incursioni.
description.spanish: Gana 66 almas ancestrales completando incursiones.
description.schinese: 通过完成突袭获得66个远古灵魂。
description.russian: Получите 66 древних душ за завершение рейдов.
description.polish: Zdobądź 66 pradawnych dusz za ukończenie rajdów.
description.brazilian: Obtenha 66 almas ancestrais ao concluir incursões.

description.english: Kill 111 enemies while airborne.
description.german: Töte 111 Feinde in der Luft.
description.french: Tuez 111 ennemis en étant dans les airs.
description.italian: Uccidi 111 nemici mentre sei a mezz’aria.
description.spanish: Mata a 111 enemigos estando en el aire.
description.schinese: 腾空时击杀111个敌人。
description.brazilian: Mate 111 inimigos enquanto estiver no ar.

description.english: Enter Azazel's Tomb.
description.german: Betritt Azazels Gruft.
description.french: Entrez dans la tombe d’Azazel.
description.italian: Entra nella tomba di Azazel.
description.spanish: Entra en la tumba de Azazel.
description.schinese: 进入阿撒兹勒的坟墓。
description.brazilian: Entre na Tumba de Azazel.

description.english: Discover a secret in the Bastion of Redemption.
description.german: Entdecke ein Geheimnis in der Bastion der Erlösung.
description.french: Découvrez un secret dans le bastion de la Rédemption.
description.italian: Trova un segreto nella Roccaforte della redenzione.
description.spanish: Encuentra un secreto en el Bastión de la Redención.
description.schinese: 发现救赎堡垒的秘密。
description.brazilian: Descubra um segredo na Bastilha da Redenção.

description.english: Complete the Hammer Core arena without being hit by the blood wave.
description.german: Schließe die Arena "Hammerkern" ab, ohne dass dich die Blutwelle erwischt.
description.french: Complétez l’arène du coeur de la forge sans être touché par la vague sanglante.
description.italian: Completa l’arena del Nucleo del martello senza farti colpire dal flutto sanguigno.
description.spanish: Completa la arena del núcleo del martillo sin que te alcance la ola de sangre.
description.schinese: 在不被血潮击中的情况下完成铁锤核心竞技场。
description.russian: Пройдите арену «Ядро молота», ни разу не попав в кровавую волну.
description.polish: Ukończ arenę Serca Młota, nie dając się trafić fali krwi.
description.brazilian: Conclua a arena do Núcleo do Martelo sem ser atingido pela onda de sangue.

description.english: As a team, revive downed allies 12 times.
description.german: Belebt als Team 12-mal gefallene Verbündete wieder.
description.french: En équipe, réanimez 12 fois des alliés tombés au combat.
description.italian: In squadra, rianima gli alleati a terra 12 volte.
description.spanish: En equipo, revive a aliados abatidos 12 veces.
description.schinese: 结伴同行，扶起倒下的队友12次。
description.russian: Играя в команде, оживите раненых союзников 12 раз.
description.polish: Jako drużyna 12 razy reanimujcie powalonych sojuszników.
description.brazilian: Reviva aliados 12 vezes em equipe.

description.english: As a team, rescue an ally abducted by a Warden.
description.german: Rettet als Team einen Verbündeten, der von einem Hüter entführt wurde.
description.french: En équipe, sauvez un allié enlevé par un gardien.
description.italian: In squadra, soccorri un alleato rapito da un Custode.
description.spanish: En equipo, rescata a un aliado atrapado por un alcaide.
description.schinese: 结伴同行，从炼狱守卫的手中拯救一名队友。
description.russian: Играя в команде, спасите союзника, которого похитил часовой.
description.polish: Jako drużyna uratujcie sojusznika, którego porwał strażnik.
description.brazilian: Resgate um aliado raptado por um Supervisor em equipe.

description.english: Destroy 77 barrels.
description.german: Zerstöre 77 Fässer.
description.french: Détruisez 77 barils.
description.italian: Distruggi 77 barili.
description.spanish: Destruye 77 barriles.
description.schinese: 摧毁77个爆炸桶。
description.brazilian: Destrua 77 barris.

description.english: As a team, resurrect 12 allies using the resurrection altar.
description.german: Belebt als Team 12 Verbündete auf dem Wiederbelebungsaltar wieder.
description.french: En équipe, ramenez 12 alliés à la vie en utilisant un autel de résurrection.
description.italian: In squadra, resuscita 12 alleati usando l’altare della resurrezione.
description.spanish: En equipo, resucita a 12 aliados con el altar de resurrección.
description.schinese: 结伴同行，使用复活祭坛复活12名队友。
description.russian: Играя в команде, воскресите 12 союзников на алтаре воскрешения.
description.polish: Jako drużyna wskrzeście 12 sojuszników, korzystając z ołtarza zmartwychwstania.
description.brazilian: Reviva aliados 12 vezes usando o Altar da Ressurreição em equipe.

description.english: Defeat Orion of the Bloodswarm.
description.german: Besiege Orion den Blutschwarm.
description.french: Vainquez Orion de la nuée sanglante.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Orion dello Sciame sanguigno.
description.spanish: Derrota a Orión del Enjambre Sangriento.
description.schinese: 击败血袭者奥瑞恩。
description.brazilian: Derrote Orion da Horda Sanguinária.

description.english: Defeat Anak the Soulbinder.
description.german: Besiege Anak den Seelenfessler.
description.french: Vainquez Anak l'harnacheur d’âmes.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Anak il Cattura-anime.
description.spanish: Derrota a Anak Vinculaalmas.
description.schinese: 击败灵魂束缚者阿纳克。
description.brazilian: Derrote Anak, a Aprisionadora de Almas.

description.english: Defeat Urobor the Reborn.
description.german: Besiege Urobor den Wiedergeborenen.
description.french: Vainquez Urobor le revenant.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Urobor il Rinato.
description.spanish: Derrota a Urobor el Renacido.
description.schinese: 击败重生者咬尾蛇。
description.brazilian: Derrote Urobor, o Renascido.

description.english: Defeat any Nephilim on Nightmare difficulty.
description.german: Besiege einen Nephilim auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad "Albtraum".
description.french: Vainquez un nephîlîm à la difficulté cauchemar.
description.italian: Sconfiggi un nefilim qualsiasi a difficoltà Incubo.
description.spanish: Derrota a cualquier nefilim en dificultad Pesadilla.
description.schinese: 在噩梦难度下击败任意奈菲林人。
description.russian: Победите любого нефилима на уровне сложности «Кошмар».
description.polish: Pokonaj dowolnego z nefilimów na poziomie trudności "Koszmar".
description.brazilian: Derrote um Nefilim na dificuldade Pesadelo.

description.english: Impale a Rocket Launcher’s missile, Grenade Launcher’s grenade, or Vortex projectile with the Stake.
description.german: Durchbohre per Pfahl eine Rakete, eine Granate oder ein Vortex-Projektil.
description.french: Empalez un missile, une grenade, ou un projectile vortex avec le lance-pieux.
description.italian: Impala un missile, una granata o il proiettile di un Vortex col lanciapaletti.
description.spanish: Empala un cohete, una granada o un proyectil de vorágine con una estaca del lanzaestacas.
description.schinese: 使用钉枪的钉子刺穿火箭发射器的导弹、榴弹发射器的榴弹或漩涡投射物。
description.russian: Проткните ракету ракетомёта, гранату гранатомёта или снаряд воронки, выстрелив колом из коломёта.
description.polish: Nadziej pocisk z wyrzutni rakiet, granat z granatnika lub pocisk z Wiru na kołek z kołkownicy.
description.brazilian: Atinja um míssil, granada ou projétil do Vórtice c/ estacas.

description.english: Push 111 enemies off a cliff.
description.german: Stoße 111 Feinde von einer Klippe.
description.french: Poussez 111 ennemis en bas d’une falaise.
description.italian: Spingi 111 nemici giù da un burrone.
description.spanish: Tira a 111 enemigos por un barranco.
description.schinese: 将111个敌人推下悬崖。
description.brazilian: Empurre 111 inimigos de um penhasco.

description.english: Kill 666 enemies by electrocuting, shattering, or burning them.
description.german: Töte 666 Feinde durch Strom, Zerschmettern oder Verbrennen.
description.french: Tuez 666 ennemis en les électrocutant, en les fracassant, ou en les brûlant.
description.italian: Uccidi 666 nemici folgorandoli, frantumandoli o bruciandoli.
description.spanish: Mata a 666 enemigos electrocutándolos, haciéndolos pedazos o quemándolos.
description.schinese: 通过电击、粉碎或焚烧击杀666个敌人。
description.russian: Убейте 666 врагов, поразив их электричеством, разбив или испепелив.
description.polish: Zabij 666 wrogów, rażąc ich prądem, roztrzaskując lub paląc.
description.brazilian: Mate 666 inimigos com eletrocussão, estilhaçamento ou queimadura.

description.english: Impale 333 enemies into walls.
description.german: Spieße 333 Feinde an Wänden auf.
description.french: Empalez 333 ennemis sur des murs.
description.italian: Impala 333 nemici contro i muri.
description.spanish: Empala a 333 enemigos contra la pared.
description.schinese: 将333个敌人钉在墙壁上。
description.russian: Пригвоздите не менее 333 врагов к стенам.
description.brazilian: Empale 333 inimigos nas paredes.

description.english: Push or kill 33 enemies that were slowing down the Ark.
description.german: Stoße oder töte 33 Feinde, welche den Schrein gebremst haben.
description.french: Poussez, ou tuez 33 ennemis qui ralentissent l’Arche.
description.italian: Spingi o uccidi 33 nemici che stavano rallentando l’arca.
description.spanish: Empuja o mata a 33 enemigos que estuvieran ralentizando el Arca.
description.schinese: 推走或击杀33个阻碍方舟前进的敌人。
description.russian: Столкните или убейте не менее 33 врагов, замедляющих Ковчег.
description.polish: Popchnij lub zabij 33 wrogów, którzy spowalniali Arkę.
description.brazilian: Afaste ou mate 33 inimigos que estiverem atrasando a Arca.

description.english: Kill 6,666 enemies.
description.german: Töte 6.666 Feinde.
description.french: Tuez 6 666 ennemis.
description.italian: Uccidi 6.666 nemici.
description.spanish: Mata a 6666 enemigos.
description.schinese: 击杀6666个敌人。
description.brazilian: Mate 6.666 inimigos.

description.english: Kill 9 stunned demons with the Shredder.
description.german: Töte 9 gelähmte Dämonen mit dem Schredder.
description.french: Tuez 9 démons étourdis avec le déchiqueteur.
description.italian: Uccidi 9 demoni storditi col tritatutto.
description.spanish: Mata a 9 demonios aturdidos con la despedazadora.
description.schinese: 使用碎肉机击杀9个处于眩晕状态的恶魔。
description.polish: Zabij 9 ogłuszonych demonów za pomocą Szatkownicy.
description.brazilian: Mate 9 demônios atordoados com a Fatiadora.

description.english: Kill 8 enemies with a single rocket.
description.german: Töte 8 Feinde mit einer einzigen Rakete.
description.french: Tuez 8 ennemis avec une seule roquette.
description.italian: Uccidi 8 nemici con un solo missile.
description.spanish: Mata a 8 enemigos con un cohete.
description.schinese: 用一发火箭干掉8个敌人。
description.brazilian: Mate 8 inimigos com um único míssil.

description.english: As a team, take the Tormentor from full health to death within 8 seconds during a single appearance.
description.german: Tötet als Team in 8 Sekunden bei einer einzigen Begegnung einen Tormentor, der volle Gesundheit hat.
description.french: En équipe, tuez un persécuteur en pleine santé en une seule apparition, en moins de 8 sec.
description.italian: In squadra, se la salute del Vessatore è piena, azzerala in una singola apparizione entro 8 secondi.
description.spanish: En equipo, acabad con un atormentador en una sola aparición, matándolo en 8 segundos.
description.schinese: 结伴同行，在8秒内消灭满血的掌刑魔。
description.russian: Играя в команде, отнимите всё здоровье у мучителя за одно его появление в течение 8 секунд.
description.polish: Jako drużyna w ciągu 8 sekund zabijcie dręczyciela z pełnym zdrowiem, nie pozwalając mu zniknąć.
description.brazilian: Mate o Perturbador em uma única aparição, dentro de 8 segundos, em equipe.

description.english: Unlock a new weapon.
description.german: Schalte ein neue Waffe frei.
description.french: Déverrouillez une nouvelle arme.
description.italian: Sblocca una nuova arma.
description.spanish: Desbloquea una nueva arma.
description.schinese: 解锁一个新武器。
description.brazilian: Habilite uma arma nova.

description.english: Reach 20,000 combo points.
description.german: Erreiche 20.000 Kombo-Punkte points.
description.french: Atteindre 20 000 points de combo.
description.italian: Ottieni 20.000 punti combo.
description.spanish: Alcanza 20 000 puntos de combo.
description.schinese: 达到20000连击分数。
description.brazilian: Obtenha 20.000 pontos de sequência.

description.english: Keep your combo above 10,000 points for 8 seconds.
description.german: Halte deinen Kombo-Wert für 8 Sekunden über 10.000 Punkte.
description.french: Conservez votre combo au-dessus de 10 000 points pendant 8 secondes.
description.italian: Mantieni il punteggio combo oltre 10.000 per 8 secondi.
description.spanish: Mantén un combo superior a 10 000 puntos durante 8 segundos.
description.schinese: 将你的连击保持在10000分数以上，持续8秒。
description.russian: Наберите больше 10 000 комбо-очков и удерживайте этот счёт 8 секунд.
description.polish: Utrzymaj wynik serii trafień na poziomie ponad 10 000 punktów przez 8 sekund.
description.brazilian: Mantenha sua pontuação de sequências acima de 10.000 pontos por 8 segundos.

description.english: Reach Custodian rank.
description.german: Erreiche den Rang "Kustos".
description.french: Atteindre le rang de gardien.
description.italian: Raggiungi il rango di Guardiano.
description.spanish: Alcanza el rango de Custodio.
description.schinese: 达到监护者等级。
description.brazilian: Atinja o grau Guardião.

description.english: Pick up gold piles, chalices, and treasures chest with a total value of 11,111.
description.german: Hol dir Goldhaufen, Kelche und Schatzkisten im Gesamtwert von 11.111.
description.french: Récupérez des piles d’or, des calices, et des coffres au trésor pour une valeur de 11 111.
description.italian: Raccogli cumuli d’oro, calici e forzieri per un valore totale di 11.111.
description.spanish: Recoge montones de oro, cálices y cofres de tesoro con un valor total de 11 111.
description.schinese: 拾取金堆、圣杯和宝箱的总价值达到11111。
description.russian: Собирайте золото, чаши и сундуки с сокровищами, чтобы их стоимость в сумме составила 11 111.
description.polish: Zbierz sterty złota, kielichy i skrzynie skarbów o łącznej wartości 11 111 sztuk złota.
description.brazilian: Obtenha um valor total de 11.111 com pilhas de ouro, cálices e baús do tesouro.

displayName.spanish: El verdadero tesoro son los amigos
displayName.brazilian: Amigo é Coisa pra se Guardar

description.english: As a team, acquire 3 treasure chests in a single raid.
description.german: Holt euch als Team bei einem einzigen Raid 3 Schatzkisten.
description.french: En équipe, faites l’acquisition de 3 coffres au trésor en un seul raid.
description.italian: In squadra, ottieni 3 forzieri durante una singola incursione.
description.spanish: En equipo, conseguid 3 cofres del tesoro en una incursión.
description.schinese: 结伴同行，在单次突袭中获得3个宝箱。
description.russian: Играя в команде, получите 3 сундука с сокровищами в одном рейде.
description.polish: Jako drużyna zdobądźcie 3 skrzynie skarbów podczas jednego rajdu.
description.brazilian: Obtenha 3 baús de tesouro em uma única incursão em equipe.

description.english: Unlock 21 tarot cards.
description.german: Schalte 21 Tarotkarten frei.
description.french: Déverrouillez 21 cartes de tarot.
description.italian: Sblocca 21 carte dei tarocchi.
description.spanish: Desbloquea 21 cartas del tarot.
description.schinese: 解锁21张塔罗牌。
description.brazilian: Habilite 21 cartas de tarô.

description.english: As a team, complete a raid on Nightmare difficulty with a score of 3 million points or more.
description.german: Schließt als Team 1 Raid auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad "Albtraum" mit min. 3 Mio. Punkten ab.
description.french: En équipe, complétez un raid à la difficulté cauchemar et obtenez un pointage de 3 millions ou plus.
description.italian: Completa un’incursione in squadra a difficoltà Incubo totalizzando almeno 3 milioni di punti.
description.spanish: En equipo, completa una incursión en dificultad Pesadilla con 3 millones de puntos.
description.schinese: 结伴同行，在噩梦难度下完成一次突袭，同时分数达到300万及以上。
description.russian: Играя в команде, завершите рейд на уровне сложности «Кошмар», набрав не менее 3 млн очков.
description.polish: Jako drużyna ukończcie rajd na poziomie trudności „Koszmar”, zdobywając co najmniej 3 mln punktów.
description.brazilian: Conclua uma incursão na dificuldade Pesadelo com uma pontuação de 3 milhões ou mais em equipe.

description.english: Buy a mod for any weapon.
description.german: Kaufe ein Mod für eine beliebige Waffe.
description.french: Achetez un mod pour une arme.
description.italian: Compra una modifica per un’arma qualsiasi.
description.spanish: Compra una modificación para cualquier arma.
description.schinese: 购买任何武器的模组。
description.brazilian: Compre uma modificação para qualquer arma.

description.english: Unlock all achievements.
description.german: Schalte alle Erfolge frei.
description.french: Déverrouillez tous les accomplissements.
description.italian: Sblocca tutti gli obiettivi.
